ðŸ“– Summary: Axiom is a dynamic infrastructure framework designed to simplify the deployment and management of security scanning tools across multiple cloud environments. It enables users to easily distribute scans using tools like Nmap, ffuf, and Nuclei across numerous instances, accelerating vulnerability assessments and penetration testing. Axiom supports various cloud providers, including DigitalOcean, IBM Cloud, Linode, Azure, and AWS.
